description.value:
Aura 1

The dragon slides any enemy that ends its turn in the aura 3 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ cold

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+27 vs. AC

Hit: 3d8 + 10 cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of the dragon's next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ cold

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+27 vs. AC

Hit: 4d6 + 16 cold damage, and the dragon slides the target 4 squares.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The dragon uses bite and claw or uses claw twice.

Encounter ✦ cold

Standard

Requirement: The dragon must be bloodied.

Attack: Close burst 5 (enemies in the burst)

+25 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3d10 + 5 cold damage. The target is immobilized and takes a -5 penalty to Fortitude (save ends both).

Miss: Half damage. The target is immobilized and takes a -5 penalty to Fortitude until the end of the dragon's next turn.

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ cold

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy's melee attack deals damage to the dragon.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Close blast 5 (enemies in the blast)

+25 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 1d10 + 16 cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: The dragon is hit by a cold attack.

Effect (Free Action): The dragon slides each enemy in its aura 2 squares.

Recharge at the start of any turn when freezing winds is aura 1

Minor ✦ cold

Effect: The freezing winds expands to aura 3. At the start of the dragon's next turn, the freezing winds expands to aura 5. At the start of its following turn, the dragon makes the following attack.

Attack (No Action): Close burst 5 (enemies in the burst); +25 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d8 + 12 cold damage, and the target is restrained and blinded (save ends both).

Effect: The freezing winds aura reverts to its original state and size (aura 1).

system.rechargeCondition: at the start of any turn when freezing winds is aura 1

system.biography:
HP 422; Bloodied 211Init +20 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 36Fort 34Ref 35Will 33
Speed 10 (ice walk), fly 10 (clumsy)
Ability ScoresStr 24 (+18)
Con 27 (+19)		Dex 28 (+20)
Int 25 (+18)		Wis 25 (+18)
Cha 22 (+17)
Languages Common, Draconic, Primordial
Alignment unaligned
Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 28 | Insight 28
